title: Agent Interface Definition Standard (AIDS)
description: Defines the mandatory schema and interface contracts for attested governance agents (SGS, GAX, CRoT), ensuring strict adherence to the GICM specifications.

agent_id.description: Unique identifier for the agent (e.g., GAX_V94)

version.description: Semantic version of the agent's current attestation.

mandate_scope.description: List of GSEP-C stages and governance processes the agent controls.

manifest_dependencies.description: Manifests required for agent operation and their expected versions (referencing SSVR).

additionalProperties.description: Manifest identifier (e.g., PVLM) mapped to SSVR version hash.

interface_api.description: Formal definition of exposed methods and their I/O contracts.

input_schema_ref.description: Reference hash or path to the input JSON Schema (via CDSM).

output_schema_ref.description: Reference hash or path to the output JSON Schema (via CDSM).

veto_statuses.description: Formal list of permitted, attested exit statuses for critical operations.
